(a) conj: until, (b) prep: as far as, up to, as much as, until.
Zechariah, (a) a priest referred to as a son of Jehoiada, (b) another priest, father of John the Baptist.
Barachiah; his identity is uncertain, perhaps father of the Zechariah killed by the Zealots in the last Jewish War.
a temple, a shrine, that part of the temple where God himself resides.

36.brief: verily, truly, amen, so let it be
36.long: verily, truly, amen; at the end of sentences may be paraphrased by: So let it be.
(denoting speech in progress), (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
I have come, am present, have arrived.

36.brief: all, the whole, every kind of
36.long: all, the whole, every kind of.

36.brief: on, to, against, on the basis of, at
36.long: on, to, against, on the basis of, at.
a generation; if repeated twice or with another time word, practically indicates infinity of time.

37.long: (Aramaic form), Jerusalem, the capital of Palestine: hence Judaism, and allegorically, Christendom, the Christian Church.
(Aramaic form), Jerusalem, the capital of Palestine: hence Judaism, and allegorically, Christendom, the Christian Church.
I put to death, kill; fig: I abolish.
a prophet, poet; a person gifted at expositing divine truth.
I stone, cast stones (at), kill by stoning.

37.brief: I send forth, send, send away, dismiss
37.long: I send forth, send (as a messenger, commission, etc.), send away, dismiss.

37.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
37.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
I will, wish, desire, am willing, intend, design.
(a) way, manner, (b) manner of life, character.

37.brief: a nestling, the young of birds
37.long: a nestling, the young of birds.

37.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
37.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
I will, wish, desire, am willing, intend, design.

38.long: I see, look upon, experience, perceive, discern, beware.

38.brief: I send away, release, remit, forgive, permit
38.long: (a) I send away, (b) I let go, release, permit to depart, (c) I remit, forgive, (d) I permit, suffer.
(a) a house, the material building, (b) a household, family, lineage, nation.

39.long: (denoting speech in progress), (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
I see, look upon, experience, perceive, discern, beware.
now, just now, at this moment.
(a) conj: until, (b) prep: as far as, up to, as much as, until.

39.brief: an untranslatable word that makes a statement contingent
39.long: an untranslatable word (under the circumstances, in that case, anyhow), the general effect of which is to make a statement contingent, which would otherwise be definite: it is thus regularly used with the subjunctive mood.
(denoting speech in progress), (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
(lit: I speak well of) I bless; pass: I am blessed.
